message: I propose a fair 60/40 split, Bob.  Let's get this done quickly!
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is more fair, considering the inflation we'll both experience. Let's move on and see if you agree.
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal than the initial 60/40 split.  This way we can both get something before the inflation gets out of control.
